title: "Technology Can Help Organizations Reduce Racism, But Will It?"
excerpt: "Unlike humans, computers don’t care about your race, gender, or religion: they don’t have a fragile self-esteem they need to boost by bringing other people down, and they don’t need to bond with other computers by stigmatizing certain groups of humans (or computers)."
